abstract: After failing to win a bid for Yahoo, Microsoft plans to buy back as much as $20 billion of its stock to boost its flagging share price, according to a top-rated software analyst.
lead_paragraph: After failing to win a bid for Yahoo, Microsoft plans to buy back as much as $20 billion of its stock to boost its flagging share price, according to a top-rated software analyst.

headline.main: Microsoft Plans Big Share Buyback, Analyst Says
